Module DataLoader¶

This document describes all classes of the module dataloader.

This module loads data from a flat file.

Classes¶

DataLoader

Class¶

class scisum.infrastructure.dataloader.DataLoader¶

Load data from a CSV file.

Variables

  • source (dict) – Dictionnary containing the main information about the csv file as defined in the config.py file.

  • data (pandas.DataFrame) – Pandas DataFrame containing the whole data from the csv file

Properties¶

DataLoader.all_data()¶

Load data from the csv file.

Returns

df – Dataset containing all columns from the csv file

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

Methods¶

DataLoader.get_task_data()¶

Load the columns used for a given task.

Parameters

task (str) – Description of the task. One of summary_generation, title_generation, tags_recovering

Returns

res – Dataset(s) containing column(s) for the given task

Return type

pandas.DataFrame or tuple of pandas.DataFrame objects depending on the task.

Bartscisum
